questions.question: What is the process for booking a cleaning service with FAST Clean?
questions.answer: Our process is simple and hassle-free. First, choose your location and service type. Then, select from our range of packages like Deluxe, Premium, or Standard. Pick a date and time, and we'll handle the rest. Your vehicle will be cleaned and detailed to perfection.

questions.question: What are the key benefits of the Deluxe package?
questions.answer: The Deluxe package is one of our most popular choices, offering a complete cleaning experience. It includes thorough steam cleaning, interior and exterior polishing, and the application of protective wax. Perfect for those who want their vehicle to look brand new.

questions.question: What makes FAST Clean's mobile cleaning service unique?
questions.answer: Our mobile cleaning service, part of Anywhere Auto-Care, brings professional cleaning directly to your doorstep. We use advanced steam cleaning technology to ensure your vehicle is spotless and ready to go, without you needing to visit our facility.

questions.question: Do you provide cleaning services for larger vehicles like campers and boats?
questions.answer: Yes, we specialize in cleaning larger vehicles such as campers, caravans, boats, and trucks. Services include engine cleaning, interior and exterior detailing, tire cleaning, and advanced steam cleaning for ultimate freshness and performance.

questions.question: What are the features of the Long-Term Vehicle Care plan?
questions.answer: The Long-Term Vehicle Care plan is designed to maintain your vehicle's peak condition over time. It includes advanced steam cleaning, flexible scheduling, and options for regular maintenance tailored to your specific needs.

questions.question: What is the FleetCare Pro package and who is it for?
questions.answer: FleetCare Pro is a tailored solution for businesses with multiple vehicles. It ensures your fleet stays clean, spotless, and road-ready with flexible service plans and professional detailing for every vehicle in your fleet.

questions.question: What types of cleaning services are included in the Standard package?
questions.answer: The Standard package offers essential cleaning services, including exterior washing, window cleaning, rim cleaning, and basic interior vacuuming. It's perfect for regular upkeep of your vehicle.

questions.question: What additional options can I add to my cleaning package?
questions.answer: FAST Clean allows you to customize your package with additional options like paint protection, intensive steam cleaning, tire polishing, and headlight restoration. Tailor your cleaning experience to match your needs.

questions.question: How does the polishing and headlight restoration service work?
questions.answer: Our polishing and headlight restoration service removes scratches and restores the brightness of your headlights, giving your vehicle a fresher, more polished appearance. It's an excellent add-on to any package.

questions.question: What cleaning options are available for vehicles with leather interiors?
questions.answer: For vehicles with leather interiors, we provide specialized cleaning and treatment services, including leather conditioning and polishing to ensure durability and a luxurious finish.

questions.question: How does the subscription plan work for regular maintenance?
questions.answer: Our subscription plan offers worry-free maintenance for your vehicle. Choose from flexible options like monthly or bi-weekly cleaning, enjoy discounted rates, and ensure your car stays in top condition all year round.

questions.question: Can I book a package specifically for engine cleaning and mechanical parts?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide engine cleaning services as part of our specialized packages for campers, boats, and trucks. This includes advanced steam cleaning to ensure your vehicle‚Äôs mechanical components are fresh and functioning efficiently.

fleetcare.title: FleetCare
fleetcare.subtitle: WagenPark Maintenance - Professional Maintenance for your Fleet
fleetcare.description: At Fast Clean Service we offer a complete and worry-free service with WagenPark Maintenance maintenance solutions for business fleets. We understand that your vehicles have a role as the calling card of your company, and that is why we ensure that every vehicle is always there looking representative. With our mobile service, we perform maintenance on location, which takes some time and saves costs, without having to interrupt your business operations.

definitions.title: Definitions
content: Assignment: Any assignment from the Client to the Contractor, including in many cases the cleaning of one or more vehicles and/or vessels.
Client: Refers to the Business Client and the Private Client, unless stated otherwise.
Private Client: A natural person who issues the Assignment other than in the exercise of a professional or business.
Business Client: Client who issues the Assignment in the exercise of his profession or business.

articles.title: Article 1: Applicability
content: These general terms and conditions apply to all Assignments concluded between Client and Contractor.
Deviation from these general terms and conditions is only possible if it has been agreed in writing between Client and Contractor.

articles.title: Article 2: Time of Cleaning
content: The Client's vehicle or vessel will be cleaned on a pre-agreed day and time.
A maximum of 90 minutes will be added to the agreed time as arrival time on the client‚Äôs location.

articles.title: Article 3: Duration
content: The duration of the Assignment is bound to the completion of the agreed Assignment.

articles.title: Article 4: Termination
content: The Assignment may be terminated at any time and with immediate effect by either the Client or the Contractor.

articles.title: Article 5: Cleaning
content: The dirt that can be removed depends on the cleaning program chosen.
The Contractor shall determine the manner in which the Assignment is performed.

articles.title: Article 10: Payment
content: Private Clients must pay the costs for cleaning the vehicle or vessel prior to execution.
Business Clients must execute the full payment within 14 days after the Invoice date.

articles.title: Article 11: Applicable Law
content: These general terms and conditions of the Assignment Agreement are governed by Dutch law.

interpretation_and_definitions.title: Interpretation and Definitions
content: The words in which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions.

definitions.title: Definitions
content: Account: Means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service.
Company: Refers to Fast Clean Service.
Cookies: Are small files that are placed on Your computer or device by a website.

collecting_and_using_data.title: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data
content: We collect personal information that can be used to contact or identify You.
Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service.

data_retention.title: Retention of Your Personal Data
content: The Company will retain Your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy.

data_transfer.title: Transfer of Your Personal Data
content: Your information may be transferred to ‚Äî and maintained on ‚Äî computers located outside of Your country.

security.title: Security of Your Personal Data
content: We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect Your Personal Data but cannot guarantee its absolute security.

changes_to_policy.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time.
You are advised to review this page periodically for any changes.

contact_us.title: Contact Us
content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us by email at info@fastcleanservice.nl.
